text: eninum, (napiye!) Avarkalil kalviyil urutiyutaiyorum, nampikkai kontorum, umakku arulappatta (ivvetat)tin mitum, umakku munnar arulappatta (vetankal) mitum iman kolkirarkal;. Innum, tolukaiyai nilainiruttuvorakavum, jakkat muraiyakak kotupporakavum; allahvin mitum, iruti nal mitum iman kontoraka (ivarkal) irukkirarkal - attakaiyorukku nam makattana narkuliyaik kotuppom
